other_tests.findings: The liver parenchyma appears normal. No focal intrahepatic mass or intrahepatic bile duct dilation. Cholelithiasis is present. The CBD is normal in caliber, and no ductal stones are detected. The pancreas appears normal, demonstrating a normal main duct. The spleen is mildly enlarged, measuring 15.6 cm. No mesenteric or retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy, and no free fluid.
